dcterms:description: A benchmark for evaluating multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms, specifically designed for micromanagement tasks in the StarCraft II game.

dcterms:description: A multi-agent game where agents must coordinate to capture prey while avoiding predators, emphasizing the need for effective exploration strategies.
dcterms:title: Predator-Prey Game

dcterms:description: A simple game designed to test coordination among agents in a controlled environment.
dcterms:title: Coordinated Toygame

dcterms:description: A method that incorporates episodic memory into deep Q-networks to improve learning efficiency by leveraging past experiences.
dcterms:title: Episodic Memory Deep Q-Networks

dcterms:description: A framework that integrates episodic reinforcement learning with associative memory to enhance learning performance.
dcterms:title: Episodic Reinforcement Learning with Associative Memory
